name: e
description: A breakout example using an Entity Component System

scripts.minifiy: uglifyjs dist/breakout.js --in-source-map dist/breakout.js.map --source-map-url breakout.min.js.map --source-map dist/breakout.min.js.map -o dist/breakout.min.js
scripts.win-debug-dist: npm run bundle & npm run minifiy & npm run clean
scripts.win-release: npm run win-debug-dist & git add -A & git commit -m "New Release" & git pull & npm version patch & git push & git push --tags

author: james.a.forbes@gmail.com <=> (http://james-forbes.com)
